tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE payment_records (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_billing(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PaymentRecords (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    payment_date DATE,
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10,2),
    payment_method VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerBilling(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BillingHistory (
    billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    billing_date DATE,
    bill_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    payment_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerBilling(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BillingInformation (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  bill_amount DECIMAL,
  bill_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PaymentRecords (
  payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_id INT,
  payment_amount DECIMAL,
  payment_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (bill_id) REFERENCES BillingInformation(bill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BillingProcesses (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_id INT,
  process_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (bill_id) REFERENCES BillingInformation(bill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Meter (
    meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    meter_type VARCHAR(50),
    install_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Billing (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    meter_id INT,
    bill_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bill_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES Meter(meter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Payment (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    bill_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (bill_id) REFERENCES Billing(bill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Status (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT,
    reading INT,
    status_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES Meter(meter_id)
);
